医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新数据揭示了 TAVR 患者经皮冠状动脉介入治疗的最佳时机新数据显示，对于稳定性冠状动脉疾病（CAD）患者，在经导管主动脉瓣置换术（TAVR）之前、期间或之后可以安全地进行经皮冠状动脉介入治疗（PCI）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/New-data-reveals-optimal-timing-for-perderma-coronary-intervention-in-TAVR-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/New-data-reveals-optimal-timing-for-perderma-coronary-intervention-in-TAVR-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ad6d84-7cb3-46d1-a6bd-43a9cf36f1b5 Fri, 03 May 2024 23:40:15 -0400 New data reveals optimal timing for percutaneous coronary intervention in TAVR patients
新颖的制造方法创建用于组织再生的对齐纳米纤维水凝胶莱斯大学和休斯顿大学的化学家和生物工程师团队在创造一种可用于在人体外生长生物组织的生物材料的工作中取得了一个重要的里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Novel-fabrication-method-creates-aligned-nanofibre-Hydrogels-for-tissue-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Novel-fabrication-method-creates-aligned-nanofibre-Hydrogels-for-tissue-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a29480a-88f8-4748-af47-69e3386928d4 Fri, 03 May 2024 23:12:02 -0400 Novel fabrication method creates aligned nanofiber hydrogels for tissue regeneration
NK 细胞在癌症治疗耐药性中的作用揭晓表面携带某种标记蛋白的活化 T 细胞由自然杀伤 (NK) 细胞（免疫系统的另一种细胞类型）控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/NK-cells-role-in-cancer-therapy-resistance-unveiled.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/NK-cells-role-in-cancer-therapy-resistance-unveiled.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66aa2ee5-8886-4017-9216-8aece7a5bedf Fri, 03 May 2024 23:01:42 -0400 NK cells' role in cancer therapy resistance unveiled
关键运输系统促进了尿路感染中大肠杆菌的快速增长由于解剖结构的特殊性，女性特别容易患尿路感染，几乎一半的女性在一生中的某个阶段曾经历过尿路感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Key-transport-systems-fuel-rapid-E-coli-growth-in-UTIs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Key-transport-systems-fuel-rapid-E-coli-growth-in-UTIs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3991cf22-d1d7-4eaa-9a85-1b956c7fdd7c Fri, 03 May 2024 22:44:33 -0400 Key transport systems fuel rapid E. coli growth in UTIs
解锁胶质母细胞瘤的免疫抑制机制Wistar 研究所助理教授 Filippo Veglia 博士及其团队发现了胶质母细胞瘤的关键机制：严重且往往致命的脑癌 -；抑制免疫系统，使肿瘤能够不受身体防御的阻碍而生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Unlocking-glioblastomas-immune-suppression-mechanism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Unlocking-glioblastomas-immune-suppression-mechanism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7e4499c-21ac-4446-8971-1a71c091b8a3 Fri, 03 May 2024 22:13:07 -0400 Unlocking glioblastoma's immune suppression mechanism
分析显示肺栓塞治疗中的性别和种族差异REAL-PE 分析的新数据调查了基于导管的肺栓塞 (PE) 治疗，显示与男性或非黑人患者相比，女性和黑人接受微创治疗的频率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Analysis-shows-gender-and-racial-disparities-in-pulmonary-embolism-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Analysis-shows-gender-and-racial-disparities-in-pulmonary-embolism-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22ae7a3-4154-4c7a-9a5c-b212241261cc Fri, 03 May 2024 22:07:57 -0400 Analysis shows gender and racial disparities in pulmonary embolism treatment
Gyros Protein Technologies 推出 Gyrolab 通用啮齿动物 ADA 试剂盒试剂以支持临床前免疫原性评估https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-introduces-Gyrolab-Generic-Rodent-ADA-Kit-Reagents-to-support-preclinical-immunogenicity-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-introduces-Gyrolab-Generic-Rodent-ADA-Kit-Reagents-to-support-preclinical-immunogenicity-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d232e00-7f88-46e1-a827-9a5ff448159f Fri, 03 May 2024 08:14:00 -0400 Gyros Protein Technologies introduces Gyrolab Generic Rodent ADA Kit Reagents to support preclinical immunogenicity assessment
在线学校心理健康和药物滥用计划的长期影响：澳大利亚一项为期 72 个月的研究四项基于学校的在线干预措施对于预防心理健康和药物滥用的长期有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Long-term-impact-of-online-school-based-mental-health-and-substance-abuse-program-A-72-month-study- in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Long-term-impact-of-online-school-based-mental-health-and-substance-abuse-program-A-72-month-study- in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fac66d31-7586-4615-a4ab-6ef59592c961 Fri, 03 May 2024 07:49:00 -0400 Long-term impact of online school-based mental health and substance abuse program: A 72-month study in Australia
人工智能扩大了冠状动脉造影的诊断视野AI-ENCODE 研究的新见解表明，人工智能 (AI) 成功地实现了从常规血管造影中自动提取关键功能和生理数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Artificial-intelligence-expands-diagnostic-horizo​​ns-in-coronary-angiography.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Artificial-intelligence-expands-diagnostic-horizo​​ns-in-coronary-angiography.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e06c15aa-969c-44b1-af45-67a69d860fc6 Fri, 03 May 2024 07:46:39 -0400 Artificial intelligence expands diagnostic horizons in coronary angiography
伐尼克兰剂量增加有助于顽固吸烟者戒烟对于大多数吸烟者来说，第一次尝试戒烟可能会不成功，但德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的一项新研究发现，如果改变戒烟方案并增加剂量，患者更有可能戒烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Varenicline-dosage-increase-helps-persistent-smokers-quit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Varenicline-dosage-increase-helps-persistent-smokers-quit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc2931e7-4970-4217-a323-8f45dbf2f303 Fri, 03 May 2024 07:43:52 -0400 Varenicline dosage increase helps persistent smokers quit
